Package fr.istic.aco.editor

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.Configuration
@Configuration public class Configuration extends Object
Configuration class for defining and initializing components of the application. This class includes command constants and dependency injection configurations.

  • Method Details

    • engine

      @Bean public Engine engine()
      Creates and configures the Engine bean.
      Returns:
      the configured Engine instance

    • recorder

      @Bean public Recorder recorder()
      Creates and configures the Recorder bean.
      Returns:
      the configured Recorder instance

    • undoManager

      @Bean public UndoManager undoManager(Engine engine)
      Creates and configures the UndoManager bean.
      Parameters:
      engine - the Engine instance to manage undo operations
      Returns:
      the configured UndoManager instance

    • invoker

      @Bean public Invoker invoker(Engine engine, Recorder recorder, UndoManager undoManager)
      Creates and configures the Invoker bean, registering all available commands.
      Parameters:
      engine - the Engine instance for executing commands
      recorder - the Recorder instance for managing command recordings
      undoManager - the UndoManager instance for managing undo/redo operations
      Returns:
      the configured Invoker instance
